sentences: Taevasel on sinine tiivik ja valge taevalaevukas.
Laeva kere oli kaetud tiheda halli voldiga.
Ta silitas müüri külge kleebi ja tõstis põrandale müürseali.
context: The word 'seal' in Estonian, also known as 'tiivik', generally refers to a device or instrument used for stamping or sealing, but can also refer to the animal. In this context it likely means something that stamps or seals.
